data.description: IDL compiler to extension between Perl & C
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
"Make XS easier to use" is an entry of perltodo.

    This module is an alternative to h2xs and XS language when an IDL
    interface is available. But system-level module like POSIX always
    needs XS language.

    This module supplies an IDL compiler to extension interface between
    Perl and C code. This compiler uses OMG specifications : IDL -
    Interface Definition Language CDR - Common Data Representation (for
    serialization between Perl and C)
